snippet: In proposing the extended moratorium, the interior secretary, Ken Salazar, cited the potential of pollution in waterways and harm to wildlife, desert vegetation and air quality.
abstract: Obama administration is set to announce that it will block new uranium mining on one million acres in northern Arizona near the Grand Canyon for 20 years.
lead_paragraph: In proposing the extended moratorium, the interior secretary, Ken Salazar, cited the potential of pollution in waterways and harm to wildlife, desert vegetation and air quality.

headline.seo: Grand Canyon-Area Uranium Mines to Be Blocked for 20 Years
headline.main: U.S. to Block New Uranium Mines Near Grand Canyon
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Block New Uranium Mines Near Grand Canyon
